requirements: ['Valid passport', 'Letter of admission from a German university', 'Proof of financial resources (e.g., blocked account)', 'Health insurance', 'Language proficiency (German or English)', 'Completed application form', 'Passport-sized photos', 'Proof of accommodation', 'Visa fee payment confirmation']
validity: Duration of the study program (typically 1-2 years)
allowed_stay: Up to 90 days beyond the study period
notes: Students can work part-time during their studies. Visa extensions are possible. Registration with local authorities is required upon arrival.
